post.author: Kelly J Lee
post.content:
시간되시면 가보시면 괜찮을듯.

Wednesday, March 19, 2008
5:30 – 6:30 p.m.

Mixed Program
Join the Toronto Symphony Youth Orchestra (TSYO) as they perform chamber music favourites by Schubert, Rossini, Ravel and Kodály. Featuring some of Toronto's finest young musicians, the concert will showcase members of the TSYO in a more intimate setting than in their winter and spring orchestral concerts.

* 생활 정보에는 file upload가 안되는지라 여기서 포스팅
post.title: Free Orchestra music at Canadian Opera Company
